alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun, east central Lexington and central Richland Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hopkins, or 7 miles west of McEntire Air Base, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Springdale, Dentsville, Oak Grove, St. Andrews, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Hopkins, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Five Points, Woodfield, Cayce Riverwalk and Guignard Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina near mile marker 57, and between mile markers 66 and 73. Interstate 26 between mile markers 108 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
